FUNC.NAME: i2of5minLength
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is used to set the i2of5 MinLength property.

PARAM.NAME: i2of5minLength
PARAM.DESC: Numeric value setting the minimum number of characters for the i2of5 structure (1 - 55).

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner to read only i2of5 labels with the MinLength property set to 30:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="i2of5:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="i2of5MinLength:30"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

EXAMPLE.DESC: Above example can also be written as shown below:

EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-i2of5" Content="enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-i2of5MinLength" Content="30"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-enabled" Content="SCN1">

ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports i2of5.
